api-reference.title: API Reference Index
api-reference.description: This page serves as a quick index and gateway to the full OpenAPI spec rendering.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: All notable changes to the Envoyou API will be documented in this file.

contributing-docs.title: Contributing to Envoyou Documentation
contributing-docs.description: This guide explains how to add or update documentation content.

data-model/overview.title: Data Model Overview
data-model/overview.description: This section describes the core data entities exposed by the Envoyou API.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.description: This page contains answers to the most commonly asked questions about the Envoyou API.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: How to Register, Login, Get API Key

guides/error-catalog.title: API Error Catalog
guides/error-catalog.description: Centralized reference of standardized error responses exposed by the Envoyou API.

guides/error-handling.title: Error Handling Guide
guides/error-handling.description: This guide covers common errors you might encounter when using the Envoyou API and how to handle them effectively.

guides/observability.title: Observability & Tracing
guides/observability.description: This guide explains how to correlate API calls with logs, metrics, and traces for effective debugging and SLO tracking.

guides/pagination.title: Pagination & Cursors
guides/pagination.description: Envoyou list endpoints use opaque forward cursor headers for consistent, low-latency traversal of large datasets.

guides/rate-limiting.title: Rate Limiting Guide
guides/rate-limiting.description: This guide explains how rate limiting works in the Envoyou API and best practices for handling rate limits effectively.

guides/sdks-libraries.title: SDK and Libraries Guide
guides/sdks-libraries.description: This guide covers integration methods for the Envoyou API, including HTTP client libraries and best practices. Official SDKs are planned for future releases.

guides/supabase-integration.title: Supabase Integration Guide
guides/supabase-integration.description: This guide shows how to pair Envoyou API data with Supabase for storage, auth, and real-time features.

guides/user-applications.title: User Applications: From Raw Data to Actionable Intelligence
guides/user-applications.description: High-level application layer concepts plus concrete registration, keys, scopes, and security guidance.

guides/webhooks.title: Webhooks Integration Guide
guides/webhooks.description: This guide covers how to integrate with Envoyou API webhooks for real-time notifications and event-driven workflows.

intro.title: Welcome to Envoyou API Documentation
intro.description: Welcome to the comprehensive documentation for Envoyou API - your gateway to global environmental data and verification services.

markdown-lint-cleanup-plan.title: Markdown Lint Phased Cleanup Plan
markdown-lint-cleanup-plan.description: Goal: Move from relaxed temporary configuration to fully enforced documentation quality without blocking current development velocity.

markdown-ops.title: Markdown Operations Helpers
markdown-ops.description: These helper scripts reduce noise and enable incremental cleanup without breaking builds.

migration-map.title: Documentation Migration Map
migration-map.description: This file tracks the migration of legacy markdown documents into the unified Docusaurus portal.

style-guide.title: Documentation Style Guide
style-guide.description: This guide defines the writing and formatting standards for Envoyou documentation.
